question: You are moving home. Please write a letter to your neighbors to say goodbye to them and tothank them for their help during your stay.In your letter explain• How did they help you?• What will you miss the most about the area?• Where do you live and invite them to visit you at your new home?
text: I hope this letter finds you in the pink of health. I am penning down this letter to make you aware that I am shifting home on March 15th. I would like to express my gratitude towards you and your family and elucidate copious motives in the forthcoming paragraphs.

Firstly, I appreciate your helping nature, kindness and honesty during the covid-19 pandemic period of time. Furthermore, especially when my wife was sick because of coronavirus and I was in a helpless situation as I don't know how to cook food. In addition to this, I was deeply got stuck in financial issues. Besides, the way you guided me both financially and morally, I will never forget your help in my life. Moreover, I am extremely attached to this area as I have been staying in this locality since my childhood. The mega shopping mall, green park and gymnasium are my favourite spots to hang out after a hard working day.

I will be relocating to 6th avenue street, the green road in the coming week. It would be really great if you and your family visit my home and let us do a housewarming party if you are comfortable. Looking forward to hearing from you soon.
